title: Cold can kill
brief_description: Presents the dangers of hypothermia and demonstrates preventive measures. Covers hypothermia caused by immersion in cold water and exposure to wind and low temperatures.
description: Presents the dangers of hypothermia and demonstrates preventive measures. Covers hypothermia caused by immersion in cold water and exposure to wind and low temperatures.
